questionTitle: Her ________ is getting worse and worse. She seems too afraid to speak to anyone.
The doctor gave the patient ________ examination to discover the cause of his collapse.
That dress looks lovely: red really ________ you!
I ________ the bell-push several times but there was no-one at home.
If you eat a lot of chocolate, your teeth will begin to ________.
I'm afraid that it won't be possible ________.
The campers put their tent ________ in a field.
I disagree ________ you about that film you praised so much.
We were so busy we had to ________ going on holiday for a month.
They ________ understand the teacher, as he spoke too fast.
I don't think she could ever give ________ smoking. She's a real addict.
________ scientists have observed increased pollution in the water supply.
Do you approve ________ hunting?
She preferred to wait ________ you.
I refuse to comment ________ his work.
Their walking-tour through Lapland never came ________.
I ________ for that job before I passed my final exams at the university.
As James had scored distinctions in Chemistry and Biology in his Higher School Certificate Examination, he hoped to ________ one of these subjects at university.
I'm really angry with Sue. The next time I see her, I'll give her an ________.
Many years ago in a faraway land there lived ________ wise old man.
